hero.description: I build scalable, high-performance web applications. Specializing in turning complex problems into elegant digital solutions with a focus on Clean Architecture and User Experience.

about.label: About Me
about.title: Bridging the Gap Between Robust Backend & Dynamic Frontend
about.description1: I am a Software Engineer specialized in the .NET ecosystem, with a deep passion for building high-scale applications. My expertise spans across Angular and React, allowing me to choose the best tool for the jobâ€”whether it's an enterprise-level modular system or a fast-paced interactive SPA.
about.description2: I don't just write code; I architect solutions that are scalable, maintainable, and user-centric.

journey.label: My Journey
journey.title: Education
journey.edu1Degree: ITI Graduate Full Stack .NET Web Developer
journey.edu1Desc: Mastered full-stack development cycles, focusing on Clean Code, SOLID principles, and Agile methodologies within the .NET ecosystem.
journey.edu2Degree: Bachelor of Oral and Dental Medicine and Surgery
journey.edu2Desc: Built a solid analytical foundation and precision-oriented mindset during my medical studies, which I've seamlessly transitioned into software solutions.
journey.exp1Desc: Architecting end-to-end solutions for international clients, ensuring seamless integration between .NET APIs and modern JS frameworks (React/Angular).
journey.exp2Desc: Mastered full-stack development cycles, focusing on Clean Code, SOLID principles, and Agile methodologies within the .NET ecosystem.
journey.exp3Desc: Working as a general dentist, where I developed high skills in dealing with complex cases, time management, working under pressure, and attention to the finest anatomical and technical details.
journey.exp4Desc: The medical internship period; intensive practical training in surgery and medical diagnosis, which contributed to building an organized analytical mindset.

skills.label: Core Competencies
skills.title: My Technical
skills.skill1Desc: Building scalable RESTful APIs with .NET 8, implementing Clean Architecture, SOLID principles, and Middleware.
skills.skill2Desc: Expertise in LINQ, Migrations, Database-First/Code-First approaches, and complex relationship mapping.
skills.skill3Desc: Architecting relational databases, query optimization, and performance tuning for enterprise data.
skills.skill4Desc: Crafting professional API contracts with OpenAPI standards, JWT security, and Versioning.
skills.skill5Desc: Building enterprise SPAs using Reactive Forms, RxJS Observables, Modular architecture, and Standalone Components.
skills.skill6Desc: Developing modern UIs with Hooks, Context API, and Framer Motion for high-performance interactive experiences.
skills.skill7Desc: Rapid UI development with utility-first CSS, custom themes, and responsive Glassmorphism effects.
skills.skill8Desc: Version control and CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployment workflows.
skills.skill9Desc: Applying Design Patterns and Unit Testing to ensure robust, maintainable, and bug-free codebases.
